{"id":821915153,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"4 months, 1 week","timestamp":1665697303,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2241 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/821915153/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Contiguous Array","memory":"19.5 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def findMaxLength(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:\n        hash1={}\n        maxLen=0\n        hash1[0]=-1\n        prefixSum=0\n        for i in range(len(nums)):\n            prefixSum+=nums[i] if nums[i]==1 else -1\n            \n            if prefixSum in hash1:\n                len1=i-hash1[prefixSum]\n                maxLen=max(maxLen,len1)\n                \n            else:\n                hash1[prefixSum]=i\n                \n        return maxLen","compare_result":"","title_slug":"contiguous-array","has_notes":false}
